data.title: Galaxy Grants ⎮ Funding for Women & Minority Business Owners
data.meta_description: Galaxy Grants offers small business funding for women and minority entrepreneurs. Fast and easy application process to get the help and funding you need now!
data.text:
Galaxy Grants

Small business funding for women & minority entrepreneurs.

Become a Galaxy Plus Member & gain access to hundreds of other grant opportunities and ALL of our amazing tools and resources tailored specifically for women & minority entrepreneurs (Please see below for details)

$4,250 Galaxy Grant Giveaway – FREE to Enter!

Enter for a chance to win our new $4,250 Galaxy Grant, brought to you by Hidden Star, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit with an 8-year track record.

Galaxy grants only takes 30 seconds to enter!

Deadline to enter is September 30th, 2024 and the winner(s) will be announced the following week!

Send this to a friend, and if they win, you both win! Each of you will receive a $4,250 grant!

Become a Galaxy Plus Member!

Check out hundreds of other grant opportunities, funding sources, & other premium benefits when you sign up

Get Help Now!

Automatic Grant registration for every Galaxy Grant – never miss out again.

Comprehensive lists of hundreds of Grant opportunities – updated weekly.

Extensive list of hundreds of funding & financing sources, including loan options, investors, and funding programs – updated weekly.

Sales & Contracting opportunities especially for women and minority businesses – updated weekly.

Complimentary $99 Master Class: Entrepreneurship (Annual members)

Members only community forum. Get advice, give advice, meet new friends. Our community of more than 500,000 members can help YOU!

Plus SO MUCH MORE! -(Click below to view the full list of benefits)-

Galaxy Grants Entry Form

By Submitting, I Will Be Entered to Win a Galaxy Grant. I Agree to the Terms and Conditions of Galaxy of Stars, and Will Be Creating a Free Account at www.galaxyofstars.org.
